transcripts.text: Do you solemnly swear to preserve, protect, and uphold the Constitution of the United States of America?

You control the guy or the woman who brings out the carts on a forklift.  And by the way, it's cost a lot of money.  It cost about $740 billion over 10 years.  Okay.  Now, what happened?
